snippet.title: Deadland 4000 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
You have been cryogenically frozen and wake up in the year 4000 to find the world has evolved into an alien wasteland. You're now tasked with travelling north to reach what may be the last of humanity on Earth.

Explore, fight monsters, scavenge loot, and run out of food as you do whatever it takes to survive.

Wishlist on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1923070/Deadland_4000/
